T02D1282:134a-1: sha wa sam ga bi dhi:/
T02D1282:134a-3: ro sreg pa'i cho ga / dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1282:134a-4: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde chen po //
T02D1282:134a-5: dri med yid kyis btud byas te //
T02D1282:134a-6: rdo rje gur gyi rgyud la sogs //
T02D1282:134a-7: brten te dgyes pa rdo rje yi //
T02D1282:134a-8: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1282:134a-9: ro sreg cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D1282:134a-10: dur khrod dang ni chu bo'i 'gram //
T02D1282:134a-11: nags tshal 'bab chu dgon pa ru //
T02D1282:134a-12: rdo rje slob dpon mtshan ldan ni //
T02D1282:134a-13: brtan zhing zab mo'i chos dang ldan //
T02D1282:134a-14: rig pa'i gnas rnams kun la mkhas //
T02D1282:134a-15: rtsa ba'i ltung ba rab 'joms pa //
T02D1282:134a-16: de yis nye bar bstan pa'i sngags //
T02D1282:134a-17: sgrub pa po la 'grub po kye //
T02D1282:134a-18: de la dang por bsnyen pa yis //
T02D1282:134a-19: cho ga bzhin du shes byas te //
T02D1282:134b-0: @134b lha dang ro yi dbye ba yis //
T02D1282:134b-1: rnam pa gnyis su sbyar bar bya //
T02D1282:134b-2: de la lha yi cho ga yang //
T02D1282:134b-3: bla ma rdo rje can mchod cing //
T02D1282:134b-4: bdun po rnam par dag par bya //
T02D1282:134b-5: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de //
T02D1282:134b-6: chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par bsgom //
T02D1282:134b-7: de la sangs rgyas gnas bsams te //
T02D1282:134b-8: byang chub rnam lnga bsgom par bya //
T02D1282:134b-9: dang po skyes bu bsams de nas //
T02D1282:134b-11: dri za rab tu zhugs pa ni //
T02D1282:134b-12: lhung ste zhu ba rjes dran pa //
T02D1282:134b-13: mtshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya //
T02D1282:134b-14: bskul nas 'bras bu bzhengs pa la //
T02D1282:134b-15: mig sogs gti mug rdo rje sogs //
T02D1282:134b-16: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod //
T02D1282:134b-17: ye shes dngos po rab bcug la //
T02D1282:134b-18: rig ma brgyad kyis dbang bskur bya //
T02D1282:134b-19: bdud rtsi yang ni myang bya zhing //
T02D1282:134b-20: lha mo brgyad rnams kyis mchod dang //
T02D1282:134b-22: de ltar yan lag drug po ni //
T02D1282:134b-23: sngags drug gis ni nga rgyal bya //
T02D1282:134b-24: de nas kyang ni yud tsam bsam //
T02D1282:134b-25: de la mtshan ma mtshon par bya //
T02D1282:134b-26: de nas ro yi cho ga yang //
T02D1282:134b-27: slob dpon 'das pa'i dus na ni //
T02D1282:134b-28: rmongs pa rnams ni shi zhes zer //
T02D1282:134b-29: shi ba zhes pa rnam rtog de //
T02D1282:134b-30: dag pa'i gnas su gshegs pa'o //
T02D1282:134b-31: yang na bde ba can du 'am //
T02D1282:134b-32: dag pa'i gnas su skye 'gyur ba //
T02D1282:134b-34: lus mtha' nas ni lus mthar skyel //
T02D1282:134b-35: dman pa'i sems can thams cad kyang //
T02D1282:134b-37: de la cho ga dang por ni //
T02D1282:134b-38: chu gtsang dri zhim sbyar bas bkru //
T02D1282:134b-39: sna tshogs dri yis byugs pa dang //
T02D1282:134b-40: tshul bzhin rgyan gyis gnas byas te //
T02D1282:134b-41: bgegs bskrad lhar bskyed cho ga dang //
T02D1282:134b-42: skye mched gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1282:134b-43: rnam shes aa yi gzugs kyis gzhug / rtsa ba'i sngags sogs tshul bzhin du //
T02D1282:134b-44: bzlas pas sdig sgrib thams cad bcom //
T02D1282:134b-45: byang chub sems su zhu byas la //
T02D1282:134b-46: slar yang bskyed cing tshul bzhin ldang //
T02D1282:134b-47: gtor ma mchod pa rgya chen bya //
T02D1282:134b-48: smon lam gdab cing bsrung la gnas //
T02D1282:134b-49: yi ge brgya ba ci mang du //
T02D1282:134b-50: bzlas brjod bya ba bsngags pa yin //
T02D1282:134b-51: de ltar thun gsum bar du ni //
T02D1282:134b-52: bzlas brjod 'bum gyi tshad du bya //
T02D1282:135a-2: de rjes sa yi cho ga sogs //
T02D1282:135a-3: dkyil 'khor cho ga tshul bzhin bya //
T02D1282:135a-4: rdo rje slob dpon dag la ni //
T02D1282:135a-5: rdo rje dril bu lag par sbyin //
T02D1282:135a-6: mgo bor dbu rgyan bskon par bya //
T02D1282:135a-7: rdo rje sdom pa rnams byin te //
T02D1282:135a-9: bum pa'i dbang bskur rnams byin la //
T02D1282:135a-10: rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor gyis //
T02D1282:135a-11: 'du byed rab tu bya bar bstan //
T02D1282:135a-12: sgrub pa po yang de ltar bya //
T02D1282:135a-13: sems can phal pa thams cad kyis //
T02D1282:135a-14: 'jug cing dbang bskur spang bar bya //
T02D1282:135a-15: sbyin sreg cho ga 'ba' zhig gis //
T02D1282:135a-16: sbyang ba dag ni rab tu bya //
T02D1282:135a-17: de la sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni dkyil 'khor
T02D1282:135a-18: gyi phyogs gcig tu sreg khang brtsig par bya ste
T02D1282:135a-19: / ji tsam lcogs pa'i mandala byas la /
T02D1282:135a-20: de'i dbus su zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po khru gang bar bya'o //
T02D1282:135a-24: de'i phyi rim gyi sor bzhi bor la /
T02D1282:135a-26: thab khung gi nang du gtso bo'i phyag mtshan bzhag pa ni dbus su rdo rje /
T02D1282:135a-32: kha dog dkar pos byugs pa der /
T02D1282:135a-33: shing gang ji ltar rigs par brtsigs te /
T02D1282:135a-34: ro de dkyil 'khor la kha mngon du phyogs par gzhug go //
T02D1282:135a-35: mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas gzhag pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D1282:135a-36: sngags mkhan gyi g-yon du yon chab kyi snod gser la sogs pa chab kyis bkang pa dang /
T02D1282:135a-37: zhabs bsil gyi snod gzhag go //
T02D1282:135a-38: g-yas phyogs su zangs gzhong cig gi nang du dris bkang la /
T02D1282:135a-39: ku sha bcug pa proksha na'i snod gzhag / de bzhin du me tog dang /
T02D1282:135a-41: dri'i dung la sogs pa'i snod du gzhag go //
T02D1282:135a-42: mdun gyi mandala gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i bzed zhal gzhag par bya ste /
T02D1282:135a-44: me tog bdug spos de bzhin dri //
T02D1282:135a-45: dri yi dung sogs g-yas gnas te //
T02D1282:135a-46: g-yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod //
T02D1282:135a-47: mdun du bzed snod bzhag byas la //
T02D1282:135a-48: zhabs bsil sngon du 'gro bas dbul //
T02D1282:135a-49: me tog spos sogs go rims bzhin //
T02D1282:135a-50: sgeg sogs mchod pas mchod byas na //
T02D1282:135a-51: skal pa chen por gyur pa yin //
T02D1282:135b-0: @135b yang sreg rdzas gzhag pa'i rim pa yang /
T02D1282:135b-1: mdun du dgang gzar dang blugs gzar dang /
T02D1282:135b-2: khyad par gyi rdzas til dang /
T02D1282:135b-3: thun mong gi rdzas kyi gtso bo mar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1282:135b-4: rdzas gzhan g-yas phyogs su mandala ji ltar 'byor par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1282:135b-6: dgang gzar blugs gzar khyad par rdzas /
T02D1282:135b-7: thun mong rdzas kyi gtso bo rnams //
T02D1282:135b-8: sngags mkhan mdun du bzhag byas la //
T02D1282:135b-9: rdzas gzhan g-yas su ci 'byor pa //
T02D1282:135b-10: go rims bzhin du gzhag par bya //
T02D1282:135b-12: de nas bdag nyid khrus byas la rgyan gyis brgyan te /
T02D1282:135b-13: mchod pa la sogs pa kun h'um gis bsangs la /
T02D1282:135b-14: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje bzung la /
T02D1282:135b-15: snod kun gyi steng du gtug cing /
T02D1282:135b-17: zhes sngags pas 'jig rten pa'i rtog pa kun bsal nas /
T02D1282:135b-18: rdzas de nyid bzang zhing dri ma med par bsam mo //
T02D1282:135b-19: yam shing dang bud shing yang zhi ba la ji ltar bsngags pa ltar gzung ngo //
T02D1282:135b-20: de nas slob dpon gyis yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs par bya /
T02D1282:135b-21: sngar gyis gsal na ma byas kyang rung /
T02D1282:135b-22: de nas gtsubs pa la sogs pa'i me blangs te /
T02D1282:135b-23: rlung g-yab kyis me spar ro //
T02D1282:135b-24: aom dzva la dzva la h'um phat /
T02D1282:135b-26: aom badzra satva a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:135b-27: ku sha dgram pa'i sngags so //
T02D1282:135b-30: de nas thab tu sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa cig bsgoms la /
T02D1282:135b-31: der he ru ka yab yum byang chub pa lngas bskyed la /
T02D1282:135b-32: de nyid 'dod chags chen po dngul chu bzhin du zhu nas gnas pa las /
T02D1282:135b-33: yi ge ram sprel mar gyur nas /
T02D1282:135b-34: yi ge gnyis gyur pa las me lha yab yum zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D1282:135b-38: phyag dang po gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1282:135b-39: g-yas na gundhe dang mchod phyir thogs /
T02D1282:135b-40: g-yon na bum pa dang bgrang phreng thogs pa sku mdog dkar por bsams la /
T02D1282:135b-41: thugs kar sna tshogs padma'i steng du me gru gsum /
T02D1282:135b-42: lce la ram dmar po bsam mo //
T02D1282:136a-0: de ltar ram zhu ba las dam tshig sems dpa'i @136a * //
T02D1282:136a-2: de yang rang gi lhag pa'i lhar dmigs te /
T02D1282:136a-3: bzang po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i me lha phun sum tshogs pa kun dmigs la /
T02D1282:136a-4: lto ba'i gnas su sreg blugs bya //
T02D1282:136a-6: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D1282:136a-7: mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa la bsang gtor dang /
T02D1282:136a-10: aom aagna ye ma h'a te dz'a sarba karma s'a
T02D1282:136a-11: dha ka / k'a ru n+ya kri tva satv'a rtha
T02D1282:136a-13: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis spyan drangs la /
T02D1282:136a-15: de nas pro ksha nam la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1282:136a-16: gzar bu la rang gi lha'i sa bon bsams la /
T02D1282:136a-17: gru mo gnyis sprad la gzar bu bdun dbul /
T02D1282:136a-20: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya badzra
T02D1282:136a-21: satva s+ya sarba p'a pam da ha na sv'a h'a
T02D1282:136a-22: / aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-23: aom sarba si pa de sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-24: aom badzra bidz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-25: aom ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-26: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-27: aom badzra ghasma ri ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-28: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-29: aom badzra aa pra ti ta ta badzr'a nydz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-30: aom badzra bo dhi bri kash'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-31: aom pa ta l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-32: aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-33: aom sarba ka r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-34: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sarba p'a pam da ha n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1282:136a-35: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis sreg rdzas rnams go rims bzhin dbul lo //
T02D1282:136a-36: de nas mar gyi dgang blugs brgya'am stong dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1282:136a-38: aom dza: h'um bam ho: kham ram zhes pas aargham dbul lo //
T02D1282:136a-39: aom ni ri ti h'um zhes zhal bsil dbul lo //
T02D1282:136a-40: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D1282:136a-41: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod la /
T02D1282:136a-43: zhes pas dril bu gzung ngo //
T02D1282:136a-44: aom ma h'a badzra h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1282:136a-45: de nas me lha la bstod pa bya ba dang /
T02D1282:136a-46: don chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1282:136a-47: de nas thab khung lan gsum du bsangs la /
T02D1282:136a-48: me lha'i thugs kar so so'i snying po las dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D1282:136a-49: de nas ye shes sems dpa' ci rigs par spyan drangs la bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D1282:136a-50: yang bsang gtor la sogs pa byas la /
T02D1282:136b-0: gnas khang du @136b ba'i lci bas byugs la mandala gru bzhi pa'i stegs bu brtsigs te /
T02D1282:136b-1: re kh'a dkar pos gru nyis rim du byas la /
T02D1282:136b-2: dbus su gtor ma cha gcig bzhag / mchod pa lnga yang bshams /
T02D1282:136b-3: tshogs kyi kha zas snod chen po gcig tu spyi
T02D1282:136b-4: dpungs su gzhag / chang yang snod chen po gcig
T02D1282:136b-5: bkang / de mi 'degs par bzhag nas /
T02D1282:136b-6: de nas mar gzar bu nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1282:136b-7: de nas rdzas lhag ma rnams rang gi sngags sam /
T02D1282:136b-8: lha'i sngags kyis rim bzhin du phul la /
T02D1282:136b-9: tha mar yang mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du dbul /
T02D1282:136b-10: yang bsang ba dang mchod pa pa sogs pa rdzogs par byas la /
T02D1282:136b-11: de yang sbyang bar 'os pa'i gnas skabs dang sbyar ba ni /
T02D1282:136b-12: rdo rje sgrub pa tha ma slob dpon la //
T02D1282:136b-13: yi ge ram lha'i sdig sgrib kun //
T02D1282:136b-14: brgya pa'i gsang sngags bsreg pa rnams //
T02D1282:136b-15: brgya'am stong du bzlas par bya //
T02D1282:136b-16: rdo rje rang lha'i sdig pa ni //
T02D1282:136b-17: gzugs kyi gzugs ni yongs bsgoms la //
T02D1282:136b-18: sbyang ba'i cho ga'i man ngag ste //
T02D1282:136b-19: brgyud pa'i thabs kyis shes par bya //
T02D1282:136b-20: de nas gar gyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag byas la //
T02D1282:136b-21: aom a'a: h'um mu: sa gshegs su gsol zhing smon lam gdab po //
T02D1282:136b-22: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas nas rdzas kyi
T02D1282:136b-23: lhag ma ci 'byor pas me lha mchod par bya'o
T02D1282:136b-26: bstod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1282:136b-27: de nas yang me bsangs la gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02D1282:136b-28: bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don //
T02D1282:136b-29: bsgrubs kyis byin za khyed gshegs shig /
T02D1282:136b-30: de ltar dus bzhin slar gshegs nas //
T02D1282:136b-31: bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod //
T02D1282:136b-33: dam tshig pa mi dmigs par bsam mo //
T02D1282:136b-34: de nas rus bu bsdus la /
T02D1282:136b-35: shi ba la phan btags pa'i phyir mchod rten bya'o //
T02D1282:136b-36: de ltar nyi ma gsum ni lon pa dang //
T02D1282:136b-37: rus pa'i phreng ba bsdus byas la //
T02D1282:136b-38: dri dang 'o mas bran nas ni //
T02D1282:136b-39: de yis mchod rten dag tu bya'o //
T02D1282:136b-41: yon tan brjod kyis mi lang ba'i //
T02D1282:136b-42: sbyin sreg cho ga 'di byas pas //
T02D1282:136b-43: bdag gi bsod nams phung po 'dis //
T02D1282:137a-0: nyam thag rnams ni rgyal gyur @137a * //
T02D1282:137a-2: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po ye shes snying po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa /
